This script in particular (originally enacted as a Run Script in a workflow) executes a workflow as designated from a custom reference field in the Catalog Item table.</description><jelly_script/><link/><name>How to Execute a Workflow with a Script</name><option_schema/><sample_input>//No sample</sample_input><sample_output_client/><sample_output_server/><server_script><![CDATA[// RUN SCRIPT //  
  
// Call catalog item reference  
var catItemGR = new GlideRecord("sc_cat_item");  
catItemGR.addQuery("sys_id", current.cat_item);  
catItemGR.query();  
if (catItemGR.next()) {  
      
    // Retrieve execution workflow ID  
    var workflowID = catItemGR.getValue("u_execution_workflow");  
      
    // Call workflow  
    var w = new Workflow();  
    var contextSysID = w.startFlow(workflowID, current, current.operation()); // getVars()  
      
    // Get workflow context sys_id  
    workflow.scratchpad.contextSysID = contextSysID.getValue("sys_id");  
}  
  
  
  
  
  
// WAIT FOR CONDITION //  
  
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not.  
  
answer = false;  
  
// Look to see if the workflow context has been completed before continuing to the next workflow step  
var workflowContextGR = new GlideRecord("wf_context");  
workflowContextGR.addQuery("sys_id", workflow.scratchpad.contextSysID);  
workflowContextGR.query();  
while (workflowContextGR.next()) {  
      
    if (workflowContextGR.getValue("state") == "finished") {  
        answer = true;  
    }  
}  
]]></server_script><sys_class_name>x_8821_code_code_snippet</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alex.chansuthus@infocenter.io</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-28 12:26:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>abc2b9d51b6bdc10fbdb78cf034bcb0b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>How to Execute a Workflow with a Script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Code Search and Snip" source="x_8821_code">0f7b73c4dba433007d159235ca96197c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Code Search and Snip">0f7b73c4dba433007d159235ca96197c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_8821_code_code_snippet_abc2b9d51b6bdc10fbdb78cf034bcb0b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mike.cornell@infocenter.io</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-23 03:09:17</sys_updated_on><template/></x_8821_code_code_snippet></record_update>
